BON Loyalty.name: BON Loyalty
BON Loyalty.description: BON Loyalty is a free rewards and referrals app that helps merchants increase customer engagement with captivating points, rewards & referral program.

Beans.name: Beans
Beans.description: Beans is a provider of ecommerce loyalty programs.

Gameball.name: Gameball
Gameball.description: Gameball is a loyalty & retention platform that offers gamified customer engagement tools for customers such as rewards, points, and referrals.

Lootly.name: Lootly
Lootly.description: Lootly is a loyalty and referral marketing automation software suite for ecommerce businesses.

LoyaltyLion.name: LoyaltyLion
LoyaltyLion.description: LoyaltyLion is a data-driven ecommerce loyalty and engagement platform.

Redonner.name: Redonner
Redonner.description: This company promotes the collection and recycling of textiles by rewarding each donation of clothing made on its website with 'Re' points, allowing you to benefit from advantages and discounts at more than 70 partner brands.

Rise.ai.name: Rise.ai
Rise.ai.description: Rise.ai is a strategic re-engagement solution that provides brands and retailers with a unique currency of their own.

Smile.name: Smile
Smile.description: Smile is a provider of ecommerce loyalty programs.

SpurIT Loyalty App.name: SpurIT Loyalty App
SpurIT Loyalty App.description: SpurIT Loyalty App is a turnkey solution allowing you to reward existing customers in a number of ways.

Yotpo Loyalty & Referrals.name: Yotpo Loyalty & Referrals
Yotpo Loyalty & Referrals.description: Yotpo is a user-generated content marketing platform.

Nift.name: Nift
Nift.description: Nift is a marketing program for pools of local businesses. Businesses give Nift gift cards to thank and reward their customers for taking actions, like signing up for a newsletter, referring a friend, or making a purchase.

Zinrelo.name: Zinrelo
Zinrelo.description: Zinrelo is an enterprise-grade, loyalty rewards platform.
